categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Clone Wars

nodes.text: Simna was a hunter who worked with two prisoners, a Sakiyan named Vadoo and the Snivvian Katt Mol, for survival against a group of Trandoshan hunters on the moon Wasskah in 20 BBY.

Simna was set to appear in "Padawan Lost," the twenty-first episode of the third season of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars animated series, which aired in 2011. The accompanying episode guide published on StarWars.com revealed that a scene involving Simna along with Katt Mol and Vadoo was written and shot, but ultimately cut for time constraints.
